description: Aaron Eites and Audrey Ewell help us break the ice – with eight ice-pick-wielding tentacles. The film-making duo join us later in the show to talk about their new documentary about Occupy Wall Street, “99%: The Film.”
contentencoded:
Aaron Eites and Audrey Ewell help us break the ice – with eight ice-pick-wielding tentacles.


The film-making duo join us later in the show to talk about their new documentary about Occupy Wall Street, “99%: The Film.”
teaser: Aaron Eites and Audrey Ewell help us break the ice – with eight ice-pick-wielding tentacles. The film-making duo join us later in the show to talk about their new documentary about Occupy Wall Street, “99%: The Film.”
title: “Octopus Soldier” – Aaron Aites & Audrey Ewell
